info.task: navigate backwards by ten options in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate backwards by ten options in a listbox popup

setupScript.name: openListboxToHuckleberry
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the focused option to 'Huckleberry'

user: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate backwards by ten options.
instructions.raw: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate backwards by ten options.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Banana') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (3) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
